Package 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(FactoMineR)

```

Donn√©es 
```{r}
MS <- read_csv("Profils_OMIM.csv")
MC <- read_csv("Profils_Phecodes.csv")
MS <-as.data.frame(MS)
MC <- as.data.frame(MC)
rownames(MS)<-MS[[1]]
MS <- MS[-1]
rownames(MC)<-MC[[1]]
MC <- MC[-1]
test <- data.frame(n = names(MS) == names(MC))
resultat <- test %>%
  mutate(n = as.factor(n)) %>%  
  group_by(n) %>%                 
  summarise(n_sum = n()) 
dta <- rbind(MS, MC)
dim(dta)
```

ACM sur tableau de contingence 

```{r}
dta_acm <- data.frame(lapply(dta, as.factor))
library(FactoMineR)
res.acm<- MCA(dta_acm, ind.sup = c(6126:7091), graph = TRUE)
```
